channel.title: Deb Lacusta on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Deb Lacusta on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: The Banana Tree
item.description: From the minds of The Simpsons stars, Dan Castellaneta (Homer Simpson) and Deb Lacusta (writer), comes a zany comedy about Angela, a convenience store clerk who dreams of being Las Vegas’ first African American female magician. But after a series of hilarious run-ins and blunders, Angela finds herself in the middle of a robbery, a kidnapping, and at the mercy of a criminal mastermind that also happens to be a telepathic banana tree.
